channel.title: Enable exporting query results from publicly shared dashboard
channel.description:
Hi there,
Thank you for this great tool We are currently creating and sharing public dashboards with external users and we are wondering if it is possible to allow users with public link to export the query results as excel files.
We are using version `10.1.0.b50633`
Thank you
Abdelkerim DevOps engineer at [Obytes](https://www.obytes.com/)
